videoSnippet.title: Crazy Queen Sacrifice Against AI Leela Chess Zero
videoSnippet.description:
#agadmator Check out all the games from this match https://lichess.org/study/kLXrkT4M

Follow Leela here https://lichess.org/@/LeelaChess

Follov IM lovlas here https://lichess.org/@/lovlas

Engine used in the matches: Leela Zero ID 125, note that Leela was running on a GPU and calculated about 25.000-100.000 nodes per move, which is a lot more than play.lczero.org/ does.

Useful links:
lczero.org, the main hub for everything regarding Leela Chess. Lots of things to explore!

play.lczero.org, play against Leela yourself!

discord.gg/pKujYxD, follow the chat or contribute to the project on Discord if you like.

github.com/glinscott/leela-chess/wiki, a small wiki with information on how to use Leela, how to contribute and much more

github.com/glinscott/leela-chess/wiki/FAQ#current-strength-of-leela-chess-zero, different user maintained rating charts to get an impression on Leela's strength and progress

github.com/glinscott/leela-chess/wiki/FAQ#can-i-watch-leela-chess-zero-play-somewhere, people streaming test matches of Leela versus a pool of other engines

Lasse Østebø Løvik VS Leela Zero
One of the games from their match
Reti Opening (A05)

1. Nf3 Nf6 2. g3 d5 3. c4 dxc4 4. Bg2 Be6 5. O-O Nc6 6. Ng5 Bg4 7. Na3 Nd4 8. Bxb7 Nxe2+ 9. Kh1 Nxg3+ 10. fxg3 Bxd1 11. Bc6+ Nd7 12. Nxf7 Qc8 13. Ne5 Be2 14. Re1 Bd3 15. b3 Bf5 16. Naxc4 h5 17. d4 a5 18. Bd5 Ra6 19. Bf7+ Kd8 20. Bf4 Qb7+ 21. Kg1 e6 22. Rad1 Nxe5 23. Bg5+ Kc8 24. Rxe5 Bd6 25. Nxa5 Qf3
